content: Hello everyone, We starting auction for our crypto casino: casino2x.xyzWe selling the business because we no have time and finance to continue with that project. We will sell PHP Laravel Script with NodeJS modules(whole system) + domain name and psd(+license) of all releate posters and graphits. You can continue to keep in on our server for next 30 days. We can advice you what server you need and for addictional payment we can install it on your server. We accept escrow!Auction will finish on 31.08.22 22:00 UTC Starting price: 0.025 BTC Step: 0.001 BTCHappy bidding! Feel free to ask us any questions that you have Â here on PM , on our live chat on site and to email info@casino2x.xyz

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Is this a custom script or a pre-made one that you bought from a third party source? Who are the original developers and are you in contact with them? Are they available for possible bug fixes or custom modifications? Can you post some screenshots from the backend?P.S. I think you need to move this under Digital goods: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=93.0

comments.author: CryptoExchange.deals
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on August 27, 2022, 10:45:01 PMIs this a custom script or a pre-made one that you bought from a third party source? Who are the original developers and are you in contact with them? Are they available for possible bug fixes or custom modifications? Can you post some screenshots from the backend?P.S. I think you need to move this under Digital goods: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=93.0Hello , I don't think i can move it to "Digital goods" i see the category but was too late. Its custom made script ( there have many laravel vendors scripts ) which is free to use by anyone. I'm core developer and i will give warranty 3 months for bug free. Code is very well writen with many comments on it so everybody which know PHP laravel and JS can edit it easy. Design is bought from third party and i have contact with the guy and i will provide it too. Regards!P.S. If some of mods can move it to "Digital goods" i will be very thankful!
